dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, B. So, uh, I saw this pretty intense news story pop up today, you know, about Shymbulak?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, B. So, uh, I saw this pretty intense news story pop up today, you know, about Shymbulak?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What happened? Another, like, ski incident or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What happened? Another, like, ski incident or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Not exactly, no. This was actually, um, a paragliding incident. A woman got injured during landing up there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not exactly, no. This was actually, um, a paragliding incident. A woman got injured during landing up there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A woman was injured during landing after a paragliding flight at the Shymbulak Resort.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow. Paragliding, that's, uh, quite a thrill. When did this happen? And, like, how bad was it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow. Paragliding, that's, uh, quite a thrill. When did this happen? And, like, how bad was it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. It was around, like, 11:50 a.m. on June 19th. The emergency service, 109, got a call reporting she'd sustained, um, presumably a leg fracture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. It was around, like, eleven fifty a m. on June nineteenth. The emergency service, one hundred nine, got a call reporting she'd sustained, um, presumably a leg fracture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The incident occurred on June 19 around 11:50 a.m. It is reported that the woman was born in 1982. A call came in to the emergency service ˜109™: a woman sustained an injury"presumably a leg fracture"while landing a paraglider at Shymbulak, above the Combi-1 station.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A leg fracture? Oof. That's no joke. So, what, did they send out a rescue team right away?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A leg fracture? Oof. That's no joke. So, what, did they send out a rescue team right away?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The Tuyuk-Su rescue team was, uh, dispatched super promptly, according to the Almaty service.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The Tuyuk-Su rescue team was, uh, dispatched super promptly, according to the Almaty service.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Tuyuk-Su rescue team was promptly dispatched, the Almaty rescue service (109) said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Good to hear they were quick on it. That kind of injury needs fast attention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good to hear they were quick on it. That kind of injury needs fast attention.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. They got there, gave her first aid, you know, splinted the leg, and then, uh, started getting her transported down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. They got there, gave her first aid, you know, splinted the leg, and then, uh, started getting her transported down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the scene, specialists provided first aid by immobilizing the injured leg with splints and began transporting her.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, where did they take her then? Was she, like, airlifted or anything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, where did they take her then? Was she, like, airlifted or anything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it sounds like they transported her to the medical station at the resort itself. Around 1 p.m., they handed her over to the healthcare pros there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it sounds like they transported her to the medical station at the resort itself. Around one p.m., they handed her over to the healthcare pros there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Around 1 p.m., rescuers delivered the woman to the medical station at the Shymbulak Resort, where she was handed over to healthcare professionals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's good news, that she got immediate care. But it just, uh, goes to show, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's good news, that she got immediate care. But it just, uh, goes to show, doesn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, like, paragliding, it looks amazing, but you really have to be on top of your game with safety precautions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, like, paragliding, it looks amazing, but you really have to be on top of your game with safety precautions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. The article actually ended by saying exactly that. It's, um, super important to follow all those safety guidelines.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, because even on a beautiful day, things can, uh, go south pretty fast. Hopefully, she makes a full recovery.
